description: Malariya ni mbi cyane ku bagore batwite kuko ibatera kubura amaraso.
title: Malariya ni mbi cyane ku bagore batwite kuko ibatera kubura amaraso.
content:
Malariya ni mbi cyane ku bagore batwite kuko ibatera kubura amaraso. Mu
turere tubamo Malariya nyinshi bagomba gufata ibinini byongera amaraso 
kandi bakaryama buri joro mu nzitiramubu ikoranye umuti
Abana bavutse ku babyeyi barwaye malariya bavukana ibiro bike. Bibatera 
kugira ibibazo by’uburwayi mu mwaka wabo wa mbere cyangwa bagapfa.
